jobs_results.title: Mobile developer (iOS)
jobs_results.description:
Organisatie & Afdeling

Werken voor een Nederlands bedrijf dat hard aan het groeien is én is opgeroepen tot beste werkgever van Nederland? Dat kan! Wij zijn een jong bedrijf dat hard aan het groeien is. Wij helpen jou en andere met het vinden van de beste deals en koopjes. Daarnaast brengen we de leukste uitjes en vakanties in kaart waar je normaal gesproken niet zelf op zou komen! Dit doen we door middel van ons eigen platform die inmiddels beschikbaar is als website, Android app en iOS app. Met een man van 50 doen we dit samen vanuit ons kantoorpand in Den Bosch. We zijn ontzettend trots op de code die wij schrijven. Het niveau is hoog daarom verwachten we een hoge inzet. Daartegenover staat veel vrijheid en eigen inbreng! Verder verzorgen we regelmatig leuke uitjes, want hard werken moet ook beloond worden!

Functie

Het komende jaar staat in teken van het vernieuwen van ons platform. We willen onze klanten nog beter helpen en het nóg beter in kaart brengen van de beste deals. Voor deze functie zijn we op zoek naar zowel een Android developer als een iOS developer. We hebben ervoor gekozen om een junior tot medior functie uit te zetten, omdat we kunnen garanderen dat we je voldoende begeleiding kunnen bieden. Het IT-team bestaat uit een gevarieerd team. Zowel man als vrouw, jong en oud. We zoeken een toevoeging in het team die net zoals ons een techneut in hart en nieren is! Het ‘mobile’ team is momenteel 7 man sterk.

Eisen

- HBO werk en denkvermogen
- Liefde en passie voor mobile development
- Ervaring met iOS en Swift

Aanbod

- Een salaris tussen de € 2500 en € 3700
- 25 vakantiedagen en 8% vakantiegeld
- OV lidmaatschap of reiskostenvergoeding (19ct/km)
- Korting op onze eigen deals
- Gezamenlijke lunch
- Sportschool abonnement en een gameroom ter beschikking!
- Ervaren collega's en een plek om te groeien

jobs_results.title: IOS Developer - Transfollow
jobs_results.description: Bijdragen aan een slim platform voor goederentransport, waarmee digitale vrachtbrieven de wereld in gaan. Dat kan. Als iOS Developer bij TransFollow.

jobs_results.title: Intermediate iOS Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Intermediate iOS Engineer

Are you an EU citizen looking for the next big move in your developer career?

OfferZen companies across Europe are hiring iOS Engineers to assist and manage with the architecture, implementation and maintenance of scalable mobile applications and services.

Requirements:
• 2+ years of relevant experience
• Hands-on knowledge of iOS and strong knowledge of Swift or Objective-C
• Develop and support software including applications, database integration, interfaces, and new functionality enhancements
• Experience working in an English speaking environment

Skills:
• Analytical mindset and good problem-solving skills
• Optimization of the application for maximum speed and scalability
• Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests
• Data migration, transformation, and scripting

Nice to have:
• Attention to detail
• Experience building an approved store App
• Experience with Cocoa and Xcode

Make this the last job ad you ever click on: OfferZen is a platform that reverses job searching: Companies apply to interview you with upfront tech stack, role, and salary info. You also work with a specialised career coach, who helps you win at the interview process.

How OfferZen works:
• Sign up for free and complete your OfferZen profile
• Become visible to 2000+ companies across Europe and Africa
• Have companies apply to interview you
• Navigate interviews and offers with the help of your career coach
• Land your dream dev job!

jobs_results.title: or iOS developer  groundbreaking native apps  Amsterdam
jobs_results.description: Employer - Amsterdam dag geleden - x bekeken Functie omschrijving Travel Apps, communication systems and the next generation of Skype. This company not only makes groundbreaking native-Apps but also makes Apps that look and ‘feel’ great! The company mainly developers mobile and web application for native iOS and Android, which are used mainly within the Americas and Europe. Due to expansion they are looking for new mobile developers that are obsessive about API design and user experience. You will participate and contribute to all phases of the product development lifecycle, including requirements definition, specifications, development, test, product release, and sustaining engineering. You must be willing to learn and work with cutting-edge technologies, which is also one of the ways this company keeps a competitive advantage. With a team small team you will work on a project specifically tailored to your experience and skillset. During which you will have a great deal of responsibility and be able to implement your own ideas. Requirements University or HBO degree Knowledge of iOS (objective-C) Experience working with web services - years of working experience Understand storyboards, layouts, CoreAnimation Nice to have CoreData, CoreLocation, Maps Benefits of working here Good salary! (above market conform salar) Good secondary benefits A company that wants you to take initiative Small team which huge goals and ambitions Work effectively in an Object-Oriented design methodology environment Interested? For more information please contact Turner Pijpers -, Vergelijkbare vacatures Alkmaar Employer Breda Vandaag Amsterdam Vandaag Amsterdam Vandaag Hoorn Vandaag Amsterdam Employer dag geleden Amsterdam Employer dag geleden Amsterdam Employer dag geleden Gouda Nacido Detachering dag geleden Amsterdam Employer dag geleden Vacature delen via Contact info Adres Employer Amsterdam Contact gegevens Vacature info Regio Noord-holland Functiegroep Automatisering/IT/Internet Functie Developer specialist Software engineer/support medewerker Software ontwikkelaar Software specialist

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer en focus op Swift voor Apple Watch en iPhon...
jobs_results.description: JOBOMSCHRIJVING Heb jij ervaring met Swift, de iOS SDK en JSON/XML data formaten en heb je ook verstand van Android Studio met Java? Dan zou je wel eens goed kunnen passen op deze functie. In deze functie ligt je focus op het maken van iOS software voor diverse Apple systemen en handhelds. In een team van andere iOS Developers mag je n​ative apps gaan bouwen op een gestructureerde manier. Dit doe je voor klanten zoals de ANWB en het VVV kantoor. Je bent bezig met de back-end van de applicaties en de front-end van de applicaties. Het doel is om complete apps te maken die gebruik maken van de volledige potentie van een device of handheld. Denk aan VR en AR oplossingen, responsive designs, interactieve designs en zelflerende software (machine learning). Geen dag is hier hetzelfde, maar het blijft altijd gezellig en informeel. - Je hebt bij voorkeur minimaal een afgeronde technische HBO of WO diploma; - Je bent net klaar met je studie of je bent al enige tijd werkzaam als mobile/software developer; - Je hebt ervaring als mobile developer op het gebied van iOS of Android; - Je bent stressbestendig en je houdt van dynamiek in je werk; - Je houdt jezelf graag op de hoogte van de laatste technologische ontwikkelingen; - Je hebt interesse in meerdere manieren van software ontwikkelen en dus ook met andere programmeertalen; - Je vindt het leuk om samen te werken met andere mobile developers; - Je bent eventueel bereid om door te groeien naar een meer verantwoordelijke rol. Sluit je niet helemaal aan, maar ben je wel geïnteresseerd? Ook dan mag je altijd contact opnemen. OVERIGE Het bedrijf biedt een goed salaris, afhankelijk van je niveau. Richtlijn is ongeveer €,- tot €,- op uur. Verder vakantiedagen, -jarig contract, collectieve zorgverzekering, flexibele werktijden, winstdelingsregeling, laptop en mobiel

jobs_results.title: Mobile developer MVVM, MV*, Xamarin, C#
jobs_results.description:
Mobile developer | iOS | Microsoft Windows | MVVM, MV*, Xamarin, C# | Amsterdam | Expats and work permit holders are welcome | International company | International teams |

Our client’s software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Their products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. For this respectable employer and permanent trendsetting software company we are looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day.

In this case; as a Mobile developer/ engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to the companies needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and their fast-paced business grow and evolve. They need their Mobile developers/ engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to tackle new problems across the full-stack as they continue to push technology forward. At the company, they care deeply about their iOS users, and so they develop for iOS as enthusiastically as they do for Android and Microsoft Windows. They strive to enable users on any platform to access their company’s products and services from mainstays to cutting-edge projects such as navigational guidance. They also solve problems at unique scale, bringing large data to small devices and crafting elegant user experiences.

As an Mobile developer/ engineer, you’ll get to work on mobile application products that help millions of people around the world, and collaborate with other passionate mobile developers to bring the most delightful and useful services and apps to life. Fortunately, this modern IT company is and always will be an engineering company. They hire people with a broad set of technical skills who are ready to tackle some of technology's greatest challenges and make an impact on millions of users.

At this employer, engineers not only revolutionize search, they routinely work on massive scalability and storage solutions, large-scale applications and entirely new platforms for developers around the world.

Mobile Developer;

The proper Mobile Developer applicant should have a demonstrable track record of attractive, highly functional cross-platform apps that integrate with back end web services and that are designed with particular attention to maximising cross-platform code sharing through the use of various relevant architectural patterns and technologies, e.g. MVVM, MV*, Xamarin.

Responsibilities of the Mobile developer/ engineer;

-Design and implement new user-facing features in the company’s large, complex mobile applications.

-Build the libraries and frameworks that support authentication, co-presence, and network protocols.

-Optimize mobile applications on the iOS, or Android, or Windows platform.

-Develop prototypes.

Qualifications:

-BSc. degree in Computer Science or a similar technical field of study, or equivalent practical experience.

-Software development experience in iOS or OS X frameworks.

-Demonstrable skills in development of general mobile apps.

-Interest and ability to learn other programming languages as needed.

-Ability to speak and write in English fluently.

Preferred qualifications:

-Experience with one or more general purpose programming languages including but not limited to: C#, Python, JavaScript, Go, or Swift.

-Knowledge of the iOS SDK performance tools and optimization techniques.

Offered;

-Work on various iOS and Windows apps that are downloaded and used thousands of times daily all around the world.

-A work environment offering you interesting tasks and where you are part of a highly motivated and creative team.

-Experience an international culture characterised by openness, respect and trust.

-An attractive, ergonomic workstation with the latest equipment.

-Their open corporate culture offers plenty of creative freedom and the opportunity to incorporate your innovations and ideas.

-A above average salary.

-Vacation allowance.

-25 vacation days a year.

-Opportunities to certificates.

-Health insurance and pension insurance benefits.

-And much more!

This international software company is open to different ideas and cultures, connected to their customers, communities and each other and dependable by doing the right thing. These are the values that guide them every day and they seek via SDP to recruit people who share these values. They are also committed to increasing opportunities for employees to work flexibly and welcome job share or flexible working applications.

Are you interested in this permanent vacancy at our client? Please forward your CV to mario@servicedrivenprofessionals.nl or call +31 (0)6 10 29 91 58. Also, for additional questions you are welcome to get in contact.

Met vriendelijke groet/ Kind regards,

Mario John Lemmers BSc.

Service Driven Professionals | Senior IT Staffing Consultant
